name: Three Haiku
description:
Written in response to the Modern Poetry in Translation Haiku Translation Workshop. 

It's a game of three: Bitsy's limited 3-colour palette calls to mind the haiku 3-line structure. Also, there are 3 haiku in this game.

Use the keyboard arrows to move around the room, interact with objects and read the haiku.

Original poems by Enomoto Seifu, Yosa Buson and Sugita Hisajo. Translations by me.
